properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TYPE , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_DATE , NOTICE_STATUS , ADMIN_NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN ADMIN A ON (N.ADMIN_ID = A.ADMIN_ID) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE DESC)A)B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE ?

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TYPE , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_DATE , NOTICE_STATUS , ADMIN_NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN ADMIN A ON (N.ADMIN_ID = A.ADMIN_ID) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE ? ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE DESC)A)B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
